title: RIPD The Game READNFO RePack MULTi6-BlackBeard
description:
RIPD The Game READNFO RePack MULTi6-BlackBeard


Information:


Released : 2013 
Genre : Action , 3D , 3rd Person Developer : Old School Games 
Publisher : ATLUS 
Publication 
Type : RePack 
Language : Russian, English, German, French, Italian, Spanish 
Sound language : English 
Tablet : enclosing ( ALI213 / 3DM-Online )


Description:


RIPD The Game its co-op shooter game version of the same movie. The player will 
play the role of sheriff, and try to protect survivors from full unichtozheniya. Uraganny dynamic team and third-person shooter based on the new Hollywood 
blockbuster will give you a chance to save humanity from evil ghosts. In the role 
of two desperate police unit specialized in the fight against evil spirits you 
throw a challenge to those who do not want to rest in peace. 


System Requirements:


Operating system : Windows Vista SP2 / Windows 7 SP1 / Windows 8 
Processor : Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD processor of 2.4 GHz or better 
RAM : 2 GB 
Video card : 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹or more 
Free space on Hard disk : 2 GB


Install and Play!


Notes: 


To play on the network you should select tablet of 3DM during installation, 
just before starting the game and you need to install Steam and Login. And 
you can change the Language by going to Ali213.ini and prescribe Language 
= "English" if not done automatically, Aside from this the game does look 
little thrashy but it will do for the players, from my side Take it or 
leave it and yes the game is working good overall.
